com.compendium.core.datamodel
Class CodeCache

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.CodeCache

public class CodeCache
extends java.lang.Object

This object store all the code and code groups information.

Field Detail

htCode

private java.util.Hashtable htCode
Holds a list of codes

htCodeGroup

private java.util.Hashtable htCodeGroup
Holds a list of hashtables with the keys being the CodeGroupIDs. Currently the hastable for an individual code group contains two element keys: 'children' is mapped to a Vector of all Code object in the code group. 'group' is mapped to a Vector of code group information: 0=CodeGroupID, 1=Name.

htUngroupedCodes

private java.util.Hashtable htUngroupedCodes
Holds a list of all code not assigned to any group

Constructor Detail

CodeCache

public CodeCache()
The constructor. Creates the hashtables used for caching the codes and code groups.

Method Detail

initializeCodeCache

public void initializeCodeCache(java.util.Vector vtCodes)
Clear the cache and initialize it with all the Codes in the current project.

getCode

public Code getCode(java.lang.String sCodeID)
Returns a Code object with the given input Code ID

getCodesCheck

public java.util.Hashtable getCodesCheck()
Return all the codes for this database

Returns:
Hashtable, of all the codes and thier names currently available.

getCodes

public java.util.Enumeration getCodes()
Return all the codes in the cache.

Returns:
Enumeration, of all the code in the cache.

addCode

public boolean addCode(Code code)
This method adds a code to the cache.

Parameters:
Code - code, the code to add to the cache

removeCode

public void removeCode(Code code)
This method removes a code with the given Id from the cache.

Parameters:
Code - code, the code to remove from the cache.

replaceCode

public void replaceCode(Code code)
This method replaces a code with the given Id in the cache.

Parameters:
Code - code, the code to replace in the cache.

addUngroupedCodes

public void addUngroupedCodes(java.util.Vector vtUngroupedCodes)
This method adds a Vector of ungrouped codes to the cache. Ungrouped codes are all those codes that have not been assigned to any code group.

Parameters:
Vector - vtUngroupedCodes, the Vector of ungrouped codes to add to the cache.

getCodeGroup

public java.util.Hashtable getCodeGroup(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID)
Returns the Hashtable of information for the code group with the given id. Currently the hastable contains two element keys: 'children' is mapped to a Vector of all Code object in the code group. 'group' is mapped to a Vector of code group information: 0=CodeGroupID, 1=Name.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to return.
Returns:
Hashtable, of all the codes for the given code group id.

getUngroupedCodes

public java.util.Hashtable getUngroupedCodes()
Return all the ungrouped codes in the cache.

Returns:
Hashtable, of all codes that have not been assigned to any code group.

getCodeGroups

public java.util.Hashtable getCodeGroups()
Return all the codes groups for this model

Returns:
Hastable, of all the code groups in the cache.

addCodeGroup

public void addCodeGroup(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                         java.util.Vector vtGroup)
This method adds in a code group to the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to add to the cache.
Vector - vtGroup, the Vector of information about the code group. Currently the elements in the Vector are: 0=CodeGroupID, 1=Name

replaceCodeGroupName

public void replaceCodeGroupName(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                                 java.lang.String sName)
This method replace a codegroup name for the given codegroup id in the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group whose name to replace.
String - sName, the new name of the code group.

addCodeGroupCode

public void addCodeGroupCode(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                             java.lang.String sCodeID,
                             Code code)
This method adds in a code into code group in the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to add the code to
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to add.
Code - code, the Code object to add to the code group with the given code group id.

removeCodeGroup

public void removeCodeGroup(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID)
This method removes a code group with the given id from the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the cide group to remove from the cache.

removeCodeGroupCode

public void removeCodeGroupCode(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                                java.lang.String sCodeID)
This method removes a code from a certain code group in the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to remove the code from.
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to remove from the code group.

removeCodeGroupCodes

private void removeCodeGroupCodes(java.lang.String sCodeID)
This method removes a code from all groups it may be in, in the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to remove from all code groups it may be in.

replaceCodeGroupCodes

private void replaceCodeGroupCodes(java.lang.String sCodeID,
                                   Code code)
This method replaces codes with the given code id in all groups in the cache that it may be in.

Parameters:
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to replace in all the code groups.
Code - code, the Code object to replace in all the code groups.

codeNameExists

public boolean codeNameExists(java.lang.String sCodeID,
                              java.lang.String sName)
Checks if a code with the passed name already exists in the data and does not have the the given code id.

Parameters:
sCodeID - the code id to ignore
sName - the code name to check.
Returns:
true if a duplicate named code exists, else false

cleanUp

public void cleanUp()
Clear and null hashtables to help with garbarge collection.
